name: Gameboy Advance Video Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie Dub
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie Dub
description:
Now you had is a full movie of Jujustu Kaisen 0 anime english dubbed on gameboy advance video to watch!

The plot of this anime is a prequel of main Jujutsu Kaisen before Itadori Yuji swallow the demon finger and giving curse powers....The Story is with the protagonist Yuta having a omen moment of his life going on Jujutsu High in Kyoto to uncurse his beloved girl Rikka followed by Gojo Satoru and the Kyoto group to annihilate Gojo´s old friend Geto and etc.

Spoilers for all the people that never read the original manga or even seen on cinemas,i suggest to do that (watch/Read the manga)

Hope you like it :like it,share it with your friends and check my other GBA video that i just made!

P.S.:if you ask me if i wanna make a Jujutsu Kaisen GBA videos and chainsaw man gba videos,i´m still working on it so no rush !
